about_the_game:
A first-person shooter where you have 45 seconds to massacre fleeing ragdolls. Pile up bodies, earn points, and dominate the global leaderboard. The more brutal you are, the higher you score. How far will you go to prove your dominance?

Demo:

A demo is coming very soon, giving players an early chance to dive into the action. This demo will introduce brand-new stylized graphics, offering a fresh and immersive look at the high-octane carnage that awaits. Stay tuned for more details and prepare for the ultimate massacre!

Upcoming Features:

  • PvP Mode: Face off against another player in a competitive showdown to see who can kill more within the time limit.

  • Progression Mode: Destroy entire cities as you advance through a series of increasingly difficult levels, each with its own unique challenges.

  • Variety of Weapons: Choose from a range of brutal weapons, including fun and savage melee options like axes and swords. Slash through people and enjoy the thrill of brutality.

Regular updates will add new features and player-requested tweaks to keep the game evolving. The game will be constantly updated based on player feedback, ensuring an experience that grows and adapts with the community.

content_descriptors.notes:
Happy Massacre is an intense first-person shooter game designed for mature audiences. The game features realistic, graphic depictions of violence and gore, which include visual elements such as blood, dismemberment, and other effects typical of an intense shooter. This level of graphic content may not be suitable for younger players or those sensitive to violent themes.

Key mature themes in Happy Massacre include:

Realistic Violence and Gore: Players will encounter scenes of intense violence, with graphic visuals including blood, dismemberment, and other effects. The game aims to deliver an immersive experience that may be unsettling for some.

No Sexual Content or Assault Themes: There are no depictions of sexual acts, assault, or non-consensual interactions in Happy Massacre.

No Drug or Alcohol Use: The game does not contain references to or depictions of drug or alcohol use.

Sensitive Topics: Due to its intense and realistic violent content, players who may be sensitive to depictions of blood and gore should exercise caution.
